column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This place was great!  From the moment I walked in
column2: I liked this place.  Unlike so many other restaurants in the neighborhood
column5: and accommodating.  They squeezed my party in even though we didn't have a reservation
column6: which was great.   Then there's the decor.  You feel like you've been transported to some old time speakeasy.  The decor some how instantly made me feel cooler.  Sigh
